name: Meadow GB Demo
description:
This demo is completely free, but I would appreciate a rating as well as any feedback you have about the game. :) Introduction

Meadow GB is a relaxed farming game designed for the Game Boy.

You play as a humble farmer tending your crops and animals in the quiet foothills of the Misty Mountains. 

Grow crops, pet your animals and finish your TO DO list in this demo!  

You can play the game in browser by clicking “Run Game” above or you can play it via emulator by downloading the .gb file below; play time is about 15 minutes.


Your Farm
  • House - This is where you can store items, sip some tea to recover energy and sleep. Check your storage box, you may have some seeds leftover from last season…
  • Shed - This is where you can sell items and convert crops into seeds.
  • Barn - This is where you keep your cows.
  • Coop - This is where you keep your chickens.
Controls
  • A ( z, j ) - interact
  • B ( x, k ) - back / cancel
  • Return (start) - open menu
  • Select (select) - open inventory
  • Up / Down / Left / Right - player movement / menu navigation
Credits
